articles.title: ‘I was completely blank… South Africa needed 30 off 30’: Rohit Sharma recalls turning point in T20 World Cup final - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India captain Rohit Sharma recalled getting 'completely blank' when South Africa needed 30 runs off 30 balls in the T20 World Cup final. | Crickit
articles.content: India captain Rohit Sharma said he went blank briefly when the equation came down to South Africa needing 30 runs off 30 balls in the T20 World Cup final at the Kensington Oval in Barbados. The match… [+3167 chars]
